summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Public Transportation; authorizing an agreement with the Municipality of Metropolitan Seattle (METRO) to provide for the operation of the Magic Carpet Zone within expanded boundaries; authorizing an agreement with Matrin Selig for partial payment of costs for such additional free public transportation; increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1978 Budget, Finance - General; making a partially reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
